title: Story Page Primary Action
description: A primary action for a given page of a story.

inlineAttachment.description: A button that opens an additional pane of information, related to the content of the story page, that a user can view. See [<amp-story-page-attachment>](https://amp.dev/documentation/components/amp-story-page-attachment/).

cta.description: Describes the visual style of the call-to-action button generated for the page attachment.

title.description: The title shown in the header above the attachment content.

htmlContent.description: Valid AMP HTML for usage in a page attachment.  See [supported components](https://amp.dev/documentation/components/amp-story-page-attachment/#supported-amp-components-in-a-page-attachment).

pageOutlink.description: A button that links to an external URL.  See [<amp-story-page-outlink>](https://amp.dev/documentation/components/amp-story-page-outlink/)

cta.description: Describes the visual style of the call-to-action button generated for the page attachment.
